Description:
LEGO Marvel Super Heroes continues the series scored considerable popularity games LEGO. At this time, the characters become legendary heroes of Marvel - together they gathered Nick Fury to counter the threat from the vengeful Loki and Galactus, the Devourer of Worlds. The story, written specifically for the game, filled with the trademark humor LEGO. In LEGO Marvel Super Heroes have access to more than a hundred characters, including such famous characters as Spider-Man, Iron Man, Wolverine, Captain America, Hulk, Thor, Black Widow Hawkeye and Deadpool. A large number of unique skills, dynamic battles, epic battles, puzzles, unique history and corporate humor - all expertly mixed by developers in the new LEGO game.
Features:
Twist, twirl, fly, smash in the first LEGO-game characters which will be more than a hundred characters of the universe Marvel - including Iron Man, Wolverine, Hulk, Spider-Man, Captain America, Black Widow, Loki and Deadpool. 
As expected, each character - their unique abilities. Iron Man can fly, rockets and shoot a laser beam. In the arsenal of Spider-Man - cobweb spider sense, which allows you to ignore what is invisible to others, as well as the ability to crawl on walls. - The main argument for Captain America remains his famous shield that can be thrown at enemies, not only, but also in the wall, then to be used as a platform. But Hulk just destroy everything around!
Characters giants like Hulk and Abomination, have special techniques and may, for example, effortlessly break through the wall, gathered their cubes LEGO. 
Create your own character with amazing editor superheroes. 
Become the protagonist of a completely new story, played out in the world and tell LEGO LEGO-branded with humor!
